# isActive

**Instance Property**

A flag that indicates whether coaching is in progress.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isActive: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCoachingOverlayView/activatesAutomatically] is enabled, this flag tells you whether coaching is in progress. Assign a [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCoachingOverlayView/delegate] to coordinate your actions with the coaching overlay and allow [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCoachingOverlayViewDelegate/coachingOverlayViewWillActivate(_:)] to notify you when the coaching overlay is active.

When the coaching overlay is deactivating, [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCoachingOverlayView/isActive] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. If the `animated` property of [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCoachingOverlayView/setActive(_:animated:)] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCoachingOverlayView/isActive] and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIView/isHidden] are [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] while the coaching overlay is fading out. When the coaching overlay is deactivated without animation, or when the animation finishes, ARKit notifies you by calling [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCoachingOverlayViewDelegate/coachingOverlayViewDidDeactivate(_:)].

## Activating the View

- **activatesAutomatically**: A flag that indicates whether the coaching view activates automatically, depending on the current session state.
- **setActive(_:animated:)**: Controls whether coaching is in progress.
